thread.title: Gold used to attract Islamic investors to cryptocurrency

title: Gold used to attract Islamic investors to cryptocurrency
text:
Gold used to attract Islamic investors to cryptocurrency 9:44pm IST - 01:53 
The UAE is a top centre for gold trade but bullion is playing a new role in financial engineering. A local start-up company founded last year, OneGram, is issuing a gold-backed cryptocurrency - part of efforts to convince Muslims that investing in cryptocurrencies complies with their faith. Kate King reports
